b'Hermes: Ai wa Kaze no Gotoku': b'Thousands of years in the past, a young boy named Hermes is named as a future great hero in a prophecy. Hermes grows up to save a beautiful princess and face the evil king Minos of Crete.\n\nThe first title in the series of anime films by the Happy Science cult.'
